artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Author: Poems by Shuzo Takiguchi; Publisher: Edicions Polígrafa, Barcelona
description: 16 poems by Shuzo Takiguchi illustrated with 12 hors-texte original color lithographs by Antoni Tapies. 9 of the lithographs are single-page and 3 are double-page; cardboard box containing large hardbound case; dark brown cover with black section across top, which overlaps white abstract line drawing that loosely resembles a foot; case contains loose sheets with images and text on brown cardboard; lender's archive #072
image_copyright: Art © Antoni T%C3%A0pies %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %0D%0AAuthor © Shuzo Takiguchi
medium: Color lithographs, with letterpress; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Tàpies
title: Material Glance
